section.title: Transport security is used by default
section.para: The transport security (HTTPS) mechanism is now assumed as a default security mechanism. The CAS service clients will now automatically use this mechanism and will fall back to GSI Secure Message if pointed at a HTTP endpoint.

section.para: The CAS service code has been internationalized.
